scripts.build-prod: echo This is a no-op. && echo Due to heavy dependencies, the generated javascript is already provided. && echo If you really want to rebuild from source use: && echo npm run build-prod-force
scripts.build-prod-force: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-pack && npx build-prod-without-tools-install
scripts.build-prod-without-tools-install: rimraf bundled-dist && wasm-pack build --release --target web --no-typescript --out-name js-framework-benchmark-xilem --out-dir bundled-dist && cpr index.html bundled-dist/index.html && (cd bundled-dist && rimraf .gitignore README.md package.json)
